item.title: How to transfer $DFG from Ethereum Mainnet to Base Network for staking
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This guide will show you how to use $DFG staking to earn $USDC, cool merch, and more. You’ll need a computer with a browser.
